Firefighting Measures.Unsuitable Extinguishing Media: Do not use a solid (straight) water stream, as it may scatter and spread fire.
Firefighting Measures.Specific Hazards: May decompose upon heating to produce corrosive and/or toxic fumes.

Stability and Reactivity.Reactivity Data: Corrosive to several materials, especially certain metals. See Section 11.

Toxicological Information.Acute Effects: Corrosive. Harmful if swallowed or inhaled. Causes burns and damage to the eyes, skin,
Toxicological Information.Chronic Effects: Prolonged or repeated exposure may cause tooth damage, skin discoloration, and
Toxicological Information.Carcinogenic Effects: This product is not considered to be a carcinogen by IARC, ACGIH, NTP, or OSHA.

Ecological Information.Persistence and Degradability: Expected to be readily biodegradable. Not expected to bioaccumulate.
Ecological Information.Environmental Effects: May be harmful to aquatic organisms. Avoid release to the environment.
